official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income any amount awarded under a Federal Pell Grant and any portion of a scholarship used by a full-time student for room and board.
short_title: Scholarship Tax Relief for Students Act of 2021

summary.text:
Scholarship Tax Relief for Students Act of 2021

This bill excludes from gross income, for income tax purposes, any amount awarded under a Federal Pell Grant and any portion of a scholarship used by a full-time student for room and board.
